column4: Hey... I installed Ubuntu on my laptop a while ago, but when it came to booting it up, it killed init, citing some problem with the graphics I believe... Anyone have any idea what that could be about?
Could I have fixed it by booting with nofb or something in that order?
have you tried booting into the recovery mode and looking at the logs?
Nah... I nistalled Fedora Core instead... :P I wonder if I have a partition where I could try again though
